structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.text: The assessment roll and each installment shall be a first lien on the land assessed, subject only to the lien for state and county taxes.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 938g-10, 938g-13.
